name: Weegames
description:
Play short minigames one after each other while the minigames get faster. There are 23 minigames.

The game is still under development. I want to add more minigames and include the editor I use to make the games.

Controls: point, click and drag; F to toggle fullscreen; Esc to pause.

Wasp logo adapted from '2 wasp 2007-04-25.jpg' by Trounce and is licenced under CC BY 3.0.
